deduction_content: 食指与中指未伸直并拢 - Index finger and middle finger not kept straight and together
拇指末压在无名指与小指上 - Thumb not pressing on the ring finger and little finger

questions.question: What is the error code for Jiàn Zhi (Sword Fingers)?
What are the two main deduction points for Jiàn Zhi (Sword Fingers)?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Index finger and middle finger are not kept straight and together, and 2) Thumb is not pressing on the ring finger and little finger.

questions.question: How should the fingers be positioned in a correct Jiàn Zhi (Sword Fingers)?
questions.answer: The index finger and middle finger should be kept straight and together, while the thumb should be pressing on the ring finger and little finger.
